title: Rose Leslie shops organic following Kit Haringdon's almond milk prank
text:
Downton’s Rose Leslie out in West London yesterday (Picture: Old Boy’s Club/BACKGRID/JUPA)

Rose Leslie’s commitment to organic eating is plain to see. Literally.

Indeed, the Game of Thrones actress was spotted out and about in London yesterday sporting a pretty full-looking Planet Organic bag.

And now we’re really craving some healthy food!

The purchase may or may not have included the Downton Abbey actress’s favorite brand of almond milk – her love of which, thanks to husband Kit Harington, became headline news earlier this year.

Back in April, Rose’s Game of Thrones costar revealed on Late Night With Seth Myers that his April Fools’ prank on his wife involved the milk substitute.

We want to eat everything that’s in the bag. And we want those sunglasses (Picture Old Boy’s Club/BACKGRID/JUPA)

Kit said at the time: ‘I’m aware this is the most first-world April Fools’, before explaining how Leslie’s particular about almond milk and will only drink one specific brand.

‘So, I just wrote an article about how this company that makes her favourite almond milk was going under because of Brexit.

Rose and Kit at the Game Of Thrones Season 8 premiere in April (Photo by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images)

‘Now, this backfired, because she immediately rang my PA and got her to bulk-order this almond milk with my credit card, so I ended up spending 150 quid on almond milk…’

Ouch. We hope it was long-life!

Kit and Rose tied the knot in June 2018, and celebrated their one-year anniversary just weeks after his stay in a rehab facility.
